structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Commission Of A Felony For Hire; Additional Punishment
law.text: Whoever, for the payment of consideration or for the promise of the payment of such consideration, commits a felony, shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than five years. The punishment imposed by this section shall be in addition to the punishment provided by law for the commission of a felony so committed.
